mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_psi_car_stock_history ( history_id, stock_id, storage_name, stock_type, stock_date, create_name, created_by, created_date, updated_by, updated_date ) VALUES ( #{historyId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{stockId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{storageName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stockType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stockDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createdDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updatedDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

( #{item.historyId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.stockId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.storageName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.stockType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.stockDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createdBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.createdDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updatedBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.updatedDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_psi_car_stock_history SET stock_id = #{stockId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, storage_name = #{storageName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stock_type = #{stockType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stock_date = #{stockDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_name = #{createName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_by = #{createdBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, created_date = #{createdDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_by = #{updatedBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, updated_date = #{updatedDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE
AND history_id = #{historyId, jdbcType=BIGINT}

mapper.sql: a.history_id, a.stock_id, a.storage_name, (select td.dict_value from t_sys_datadict td where td.dict_code=a.stock_type) stock_type, a.stock_date, a.create_name, a.created_by, a.created_date, a.updated_by, a.updated_date
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_psi_car_stock_history a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.history_id = #{historyId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
